column4: I am new to linux and am wondering if compiling a program from source is something that would be to difficult for me
does anyone know of a good tutorial for compiling stuff?
im trying to get the most recent version of rhythmbox 0.9.8 the one that dapper has is 0.9.3 so I figure the only way to get the newest one is by compiling it
except we use `checkinstall' to keep packages manageable, as `make install' puts crap everywhere.
